website_summaries.verdict: Our pick for the gardener who is looking for a true hydroponic growing experience.
pros: Comes with everything you need to get started right away
Perfect for the gardener who has a dedicated area for their gardening hobby
Works well both indoors and outdoors
cons: Takes up more room and is less attractive than other systems

customer_reviews.title: Great Beginner unit.
customer_reviews.text: Great beginners unit. not sure why people review it low saying you can make it cheaper. obviously you can. The review should be about the system itself. Anyway.... kit came with everything shown. Bucket, clay, tubing, air pump, rockwool, and stone diffuser. It is perfect for your first system to learn with. Only reason I took off 1 star, the air pump is not very good. I ended up later upgrading it. Works fine for some plants, but larger plants that may need more oxygen should have a larger pump.
customer_reviews.author: Tommyz

customer_reviews.title: Highly  recommended just get larger air stones and a better pump
customer_reviews.text: Got some great results with this product just be sure to keep everything super clean to avoid root rot as it is indeed a problem that is hard to get rid of but this is a very good set up that comes with everything you need I would recomend getting bigger air stones though
customer_reviews.author: #1 Honest reviewer :)

customer_reviews.title: Separately.
customer_reviews.text: Buy the parts you need separately. You will thank me later. Lots of companies bundle things together so that you buy what you need all at once and you think you are getting a deal. Ends up the things that come with it are low end. Build your own system.
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great For First Time DWC'ers..
customer_reviews.text: I say its good. All ready to go, got me started. Though I would like to have had a larger stone and a little more powerful pump. I did go buy a larger 4in stone and a larger pump. I would buy again. Saves me the diy time from having to make my own. Great starter kit for a first time DWC grower without all the dollar investment. Love the outside tube that shows you water levels and ease of getting water to check your EC and PH. A must get for first time DWC'ers...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: First the good. Im extremely happy with bucket and the site tube. The 6" basket is nice and I like the blue air tube. Havingsaid that im extremely disappointed with both the pump and the air stone. The pump is only 2w and the the stone is 1.7. In my 3.5 fal bucket it barely made a bubble. I could have farted better bubbles. The pump is not strong enough for a 5 gal system.
customer_reviews.author: H.T.G.T

customer_reviews.title: THE EASY WAY
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product, it works and can be reused. It is simple, it uses a small cage for you pebble, and you don't have to change the water for 3-4 weeks if you don't want too. It's funny because, I have other brands and when I started using this I thought it would be the worst of them all. However to my surprise, they did the best job with the least amount of work. They worked so well I ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leaks.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 one leaks. Be very carfull with this leaky bucket around electricity.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: the pump works great its not even loud
customer_reviews.text: it came with everything it listed. the pump works great its not even loud. the air stone is a good size but i got a bigger one. the medium is okay medium. honestly this hydroponic kit is really worth it
customer_reviews.author: Joshua garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised. No seller response to thier parts substitutions. Not a food grade bucket.
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with a mish mash of generic parts different than what was advertised. There was no water line marker. The bucket was not real food grade either. When I messaged the seller I go no response at all ever. Go to home depot and buy the parts yourself for much less and then you truly know you will get what you order/pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Bucket leaks dont buy
customer_reviews.text: The bucket leaked from the joint as soon as I put water in it. Ended up going to home depot and just getting another bucket and forgoing that water meter. Total waste of money. 0/10.
customer_reviews.author: Imjustagrill

customer_reviews.title: My first unit, great for getting started and learning.
customer_reviews.text: My first grow is a tomato plant. it is substantially larger than the dirt plants started at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed, never even got to try it out before ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, never even got to try it out before it started leaking all the nutrient water I put into it was all over the floor. Id recommend if you like a mess
customer_reviews.author: Joy Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Nice system does not  leak but....
customer_reviews.text: Nice system I bought two of them, does not leak at all when properly assembled I am holding one star back because I bought two of them and the pump outputs are different,one pump bubbles like crazy, the other well just is not up to par,and yes both are cranked to max,switched airstones around and same issue,one of the pumps is weak,I realize it is a cheap 8 dollar pump at any pet store, but still not happy about this.
customer_reviews.author: David. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Buy a better pump.
customer_reviews.text: Pump sucks. Shipping sucked. Buckets really good and air stone is standard. The did a good job with the placement of the water gauge tube.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: learned a lot from this bucket
customer_reviews.text: best for starters. absolutely best for anyone in any experience level. kinda big tho. im not knocking it tho cause now i know how to make me a bunch of smaller systems. good product. good for learning
customer_reviews.author: HA-HA-HA NO.

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: Item came with missing pieces try contacting and no response

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Saves a lot of time not having to make the lid myself. The hydroton and water level indicator are a plus. People buying this product may want to purchase a more powerful pump for the air bubbles.

customer_reviews.title: Mmm.. it's ok
customer_reviews.text: I have two versions of this bucket. The older one was a little more in price but there was more quality and versatility. Not to much like these on the market for this price, I think maybe 3 or 4. I'm willing to try another company since the upgrade made to the system did more harm than good.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: First time trying hydroponics and I'm surprised how well they work. No complaints.

customer_reviews.title: Kit is complete
customer_reviews.text: Pros: All you need is to add seedlings or seed and the sun or a grow light. No muss no fuss. Cons: Tube for measuring water level is from a roll so it's curved and doesn't want to stay in place. I taped mine to the side with duct tape. Overall I agree with the other reviews...they do all the work and don't charge a lot to do it.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this one

customer_reviews.title: Shipping on point
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, this product is easy to use and I like they way they shipped it.

customer_reviews.title: Needless to say he loved them and they work perfectly

customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and basically hands free operation just add nutrients and water when needed. Perfect for herb garden.

customer_reviews.text: Maybe I missed a step or something but it kills every plant I put in.

customer_reviews.title: Drill the hole for the air hose bigger.
customer_reviews.text: The buckets great. The first one came with blue flexible tubing. The last 2 came with hdpe black tubing. I do not like the black tubing it does what it wants. U cant train it. The flexible blue tubing goes where you put it. Drill the air hose hole 1 size bigger or hire rowdy rowdy piper and hacksaw jim duggan to help you push the air hose back through after a bucket change. Yea you can go to home depot walmart pet store to get everything you need. But after all that time driving and drilling holes. You have just spent twice as much even before you leak tested your first bucket.
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Should have been perfect, but it leaks...
customer_reviews.text: It seemed to be very convenient not to have to build this myself, but the grommet / fill-line tube leaks. Sorry, no good.

customer_reviews.title: A good starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This was a good intro into making some spinach cultures. I'd like to go into more soil-free produce production!

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: Leaks at the base. It was a nightmare to get delivered since they wouldn't leave it with a signature. It's a 5 gallon bucket who cares to steal it? I got my flat-screen from Amazon left at my door. Anyway. It leaks at the base. What would it have cost for some silicone sealer. All they did was drill a hole and put a rubber adapter for the water measurement line which is blue and impossible to read as others have pointed out. You could build this yourself probably for less and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Matt J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great directions!! Arrived just as described! Amazing, thank you!!! Can't wait till my tomatoes are nice and plummy :)
customer_reviews.author: Colby

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginners like me!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time trying a DWC hydro method so after I did a little research I decided on this one over the bin with four holes in it also on amazon. So far it's working great! My plant is growing so fast and I've added another pump for extra bubbles and air. Just make sure you keep an eye on the PH and use organic additives! Comes with modified bucket, large air-stone, tubing, air-pump, grow stones(not the same ones in the picture but they seem to work) and a few rock wool cubes to get you started! I might buy another but all and all I'm happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Derek. E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice job! It was all there and in good shape.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: perfect beginner system
customer_reviews.text: Everything works fine. 5 gallon bucket and 6 inch net pot is enough to support a very large plant. Only issue I had was leakage from the rim. When you run the air pump at full capacity and you fill the bucket to the top line, the air bubbles will sprinkle water to the underside of the lid causing it to leak around the rim.

customer_reviews.title: Very good product,  just a few warnings.
customer_reviews.text: The pump works great, the bucket is sturdy and everything fits together good. Just got to be careful with the tube on the side, it will dump water fast, and the basket being part of the lid is great but if you don't pay attention to how much water you add the air pressure building and not being able to escape around the rocks will cause the rocks to be pushed upwards and move. Mine was still a seedling and got buried and died.

I ended up having to duck tape the blue water level indicator hose upright to the bucket as the little pin and screw was not effective at keeping the tube upright and in place, but with a little duck tape it worked fine. Great price, comes with your air stone, and the bubbler.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great kit for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit for the price. Other reviewers claimed it's cheaper to build your own, so I bought one and then shopped for all of its components to build more. Turns out it's actually cheaper to get the kit. It's great for a first timer like myself. 3 weeks of use and one of the three air pumps died, good thing I noticed before my plants drowned. I dropped a star for that, lesson learned; always have a backup ready. Update: Another lesson learned, always read ALL the instructions carefully, apparently i placed my air pumps at floor level about a foot below the water level which caused water to siphon into the pump. Beginner's error : (
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: First time Hydroponics system
customer_reviews.text: Great quality air pump Construction with an AirStone lid doesn't closed all the way because it been in the sun too long but otherwise works great

customer_reviews.title: Great Product !
customer_reviews.text: I received my order a day early it was 100% as described in the description. Ive noticed a few complaints about the water level tube bein side ways from coming off a roll this is not an issue at all, all you have to do is turn the tube so that thw curvature is facing the bucket and put the top of the tube in the loop bracket and it will be perfectly straight . It took me less than 3 mins to set up there is no special skills required just add water plants and nutrients.

customer_reviews.title: Great

I had a couple questions and emailed the people at PowerGrow Systems. Within a couple hours I had the answers. That kind of customer service just doesn't seem to exist much anymore, and it was much appreciated. I'm going to keep coming back to this company.

Also the intake hole in the bucket for the tubing going from the pump to the air stone was placed directly over the top of the drain/level hose so it is impossible to get the drain tube to stand up exactly straight. Other than these flaws the system is great.

THe airpump and stone are clearly stated, so i cant get mad at the company, but i would not purchase this again, would return it, if i wasn't in a bind. I will be using it for a few days, but will be replacing the pump and airstone ASAP.

product_meta.title: Deep Water Culture (DWC) Hydroponic Bucket Kit 5 Gallon, 6 inch
product_meta.description: Looking for an inexpensive and easy way to grow hydroponically? The PowerGrow Systems Deep Water Culture System is the answer! Super easy to use, the DWC system allows you to get up and growing in no time, with very little effort. The PowerGrow Deep Water Culture System includes everything you need for a complete system. In a Deep Water Culture system, the plant roots are immersed in an oxygen infused and nutrient rich water reservoir (a 5 gallon HDPE bucket). The oxygen rich solution helps build healthy root systems faster and more efficiently than soil which results in superior plant growth and production. The PowerGrow Deep Water Culture System includes the following: 5 Gallon HDPE Bucket, 6" Net Pot Bucket Lid, Growing Medium, 44 gph Air Pump, Air Tubing, Air Stone, 3 Grodan Rockwool Starter Plugs, Blue Water Level Indicator + Drain, Complete Instructions, 1 Year Warranty. (Nutrients and pH test Kit not included) With the PowerGrow brand, you also get the quality assurance of a 1 year Manufacturers USA warranty. So what are you waiting for? Get growing with a PowerGrow DWC Deep Water Culture System today!
feature_bullets: Easy to use inexpensive complete kit - Deep Water Culture Hydroponic System by PowerGrow Systems
Includes 5 Gallon HDPE Bucket + 6 inch Basket Lid
Also includes 44 GPH Air Pump, Air Tubing, Air Stone, Growing Medium, and Rockwool Seeds Starting Plugs
Features visible blue Water Level Indicator and Bucket Drain
1 Year USA Manufacturers Warranty on all Deep Water Culture Systems!
